#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
//#include <conio.h>
#include <math.h>

long long int d[5000000] = {0};
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
    long long int t, n, i, mul, j, mod;
    scanf ("%llu", &t);
    for (i = 1; i <= sqrt (500000); i++) {
        j = 1;
        while (i * j <= 500000) {
              d[i * j]++;
              if (j > sqrt (500000)) {
                    d[i * j]++;
              }
              j++;
        }
    }
    
    for (i = 2; i <= 500000; i++) {
        
        d[i]--;
        d[i]--;
     //   printf ("%llu\n", d[i]);
    }
    while (t--) {
          mod = 0;
          mul = 1;
          scanf ("%llu", &n);
          for (i = 1; i <= d[n]/2; i++) {
              //printf ("%llu\n", d[n]);
              mul = mul * n;
              if (mul > 9999) {
                 mul = mul % 10000;
                 mod = 1;
              }
          }
          
          if (d[n] == 0) {
                   mul = 1;
          }
          if (d[n] % 2 == 1) {
                   mul = mul * (sqrt (n));
          }
          if (mul > 9999) {
                 mul = mul % 10000;
                 mod = 1;
          }if(mod == 1)	printf("%04llu\n",mul);
		else	printf("%llu\n",mul);
          //printf ("%llu\n", mul);
    }
   return 0; 
 //   getch ();
}
